meanings.definition: Paper that has been used and is no longer needed.
meanings.sent1: I collected all the wastepaper to recycle it.
meanings.sent2: After finishing my drawing, I crumpled up the wastepaper and threw it away.
meanings.sent3: The wastepaper decided to have a party in the recycling bin.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like wastepaper, crumpled and discarded.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with colorful wastepaper from the art project.

meanings.definition: Paper that is thrown away as trash.
meanings.sent1: The office bins were overflowing with wastepaper.
meanings.sent2: She tossed the wastepaper into the bin without a second thought.
meanings.sent3: The wastepaper rebellion against the trash can failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: His dreams lay scattered like wastepaper on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The wind carried the wastepaper across the empty street.
